WorkItem.Description:
It would be possible to let two instances of rawr to be open at the same time??
I usually miss this feature because i have one rawr open with my BiS config for my main spec, to remember if i need something from a specific boss during raids and i would like to let another one open with my BiS config for my off spec to know if i need something for it too.
I know that i could just write it down but , from my point of view(and i dont know a thing about the rawr source code), seems like a pretty easy thing to change on rawr to let another instance to be opened.

Comments.Message: Err, no, don't open different versions. Open the same version in multiple places. Duplicate the whole Rawr folder.

You can have more than one open at the same time if you use multiple versions (eg- a 2.3.1 and 2.3.2). We don't want multiple of the same version up at the same time as that breaks the config files.



** Closed by Jothay 12/16/2009 2:29 PM
Err, no, don't open different versions. Open the same version in multiple places. Duplicate the whole Rawr folder.
